review_text:
I personally hated the quiz in this course. I bought a course for having input and let me make decisions MY way and not with another person's brain.

"is it best that sacrifice 10 people or sacrifice just 1?" 

Only an insane person would answer this question period

This is a great course from a wise person.
It will surely help me take more important decisions at the right time to improve my personal branding "MrFullTime.com".

It will also make me help my Fiverr customers with my passive income methods I offer to them, as they are related to taking the right decisions at the right time buying and selling domain names with 5x or even 10x ROI.

Thanks once again Mr. Michael :)
Mustapha

The course was interesting but very very basic. Maybe I had high expectations, as it was offered by fiverr. Most of the decision-making methodologies suggested in the 5th Section were so common-sensical that you tend to use them anyway.  May be the critical or the more cerebral part will be offered in the next course by the same Author. Book recommendations at the end were pretty good and useful.  I don't know whether it was a course or a trailer to purchase more stuff!
Decent content packed in a rather short course.
The instructor was clear and easy to understand, presenting his points simply, but transmitting valuable information at the same time. For me, buying the course is the right decision.
